title: Congrats RIOT!!!
body:
I am very very very impressed with the snowdown skins! 
you can tell a lot of effort went into them, right down to the little detail of having one of Bard's meeps frozen solid in Mega Gnar's boulder.
well done!

replies.body: I'm gonna have to git gud at el Bardo now, because that skin is amazing.
And you turn into a penguin when you go on a magical journey!
mow much more flipping magical can you get!
SNOWDAY GNAR AND SNOWDAY BARD IS SO GOOOOD
